name: Chariot Race (itch)
description:
Download will be there in a while ...

A Game made in 72h for Ludum Dare 36

Race in your chariot and win over your enemies with some technical tricks built into your vehicle.

You earn money at the end of each round, depending on your place, to buy upgrades for you chariot.

There are currently 3 tracks which get randomly selected.

Extras

Spikes: Spikes come out of your wheels and stop enemies passing you
Wings: Wings help you to jump over obstacles, enemies or grass
Flamethrower: Stop enemies in front of you by burning them with your flamethrower
Unicorn: Unicorns are by far the fastest horses

Controls

A,D - steer
Space - jump (needs wings)
H - activate flamethrower
J - activate spikes
